text: Va cun [Ismoil] ʙa [sinni navcavoni va] haddi talos [va hamkori] ʙo u [Iʙrohim] rasid, ʙa vaj guft: Pisaram, dar xoʙ [ʙa man vahj mesavad va] meʙinam, ki turo zaʙh mekunam. Nazarat dar in ʙora cist?» [Ismoil] guft: «Padarcon, on ciro ki ʙa tu amr sudaast ancom ʙideh. Insoalloh maro [dar ʙaroʙari in farmon] sikeʙo xohi joft»
